title: Paints and Coatings Market Size to Hit USD 348.04 Bn by 2034
description: The paints and coatings market size is calculated at USD 222.24 bn in 2025 and is expected to reach USD 348.04 bn by 2034, growing at a CAGR of 5.11%.......
content:
Ottawa, Dec. 04, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The global paints and coatings market size
